target: Oh wow, I didn't know that, are there any exercises you can do while walking?
context: <user> I love hiking and taking long walks on trails. <system> I haven't for so long! There are a ton of nature trails in Iowa <user> I need to check those out. I've been hiking mainly for the health benefits. <system> What are some of the health benefits from hiking? <user> It's just good exercise to walk very far in a single day. <system> I see well that completely makes sense, do you ever run on your hikes <user> Sometimes, in New Zealand hiking is known as tramping. <system>
